actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to extend the time within which assurances of local cooperation must be provided on a portion of the Texas City and vicinity, Texas, flood control project.

summary.text: Extends to July 1, 1974, the time within which assurances of local cooperation must be provided on a portion of the Texas City and vicinity, Texas, flood control project for entitlement to Federal assistance under the Flood Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend the time within which assurances of local cooperation must be provided on a portion of the Texas City and vicinity, Texas, flood control project.
